Description: We are seeking a senior Python developer with experience in Django and Flask. Knowledge of machine learning libraries like scikit-learn is a plus. Strong problem solving and communication skills are required.
As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for building modern web applications using React and JavaScript. Experience with version control (Git) is essential. Teamwork is key.

We are looking for a Data Scientist proficient in Python, R, and SQL. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, statistical modeling, and data analysis. Experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch is highly valued.

The Project Manager will oversee software development projects, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget. Must have experience with Agile and Scrum methodologies. Excellent leadership and communication skills are a must.
Entry-level Java Engineer position. Basic knowledge of Java and object-oriented programming is required. Eagerness to learn and strong problem solving abilities are more important than experience.
We need a DevOps Engineer with experience in Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure is a must. Git is used for version control.
